example.name: intelligent-j: both args
example.text: She is intelligent at deriving formulas.

roleset.name: espionage activities

example.name: intelligence-n
example.text: according to former U.S. intelligence officials .

example.name: intelligence-n
example.text: Early in the afternoon of yesterday we received intelligence that the wires had been out between Mallow, Killarney, and Valentin.
example.arg: that the wires had been out between Mallow, Killarney, and Valentin.

example.name: intelligence-n
example.text: The National Intelligence Agency (MİT) received intelligence on possible New Year’s Eve attacks planned by the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL) on Dec. 19 and conducted operations against ISIL suspects between Dec. 28 and 31.
example.arg: on possible New Year’s Eve attacks planned by the Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant (ISIL)

roleset.note: INTELLIGENCE-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on Lorelei. Comparison to know.01 and think.01, especially regards to the attributive arg2.
